column5: Just ripped through Burlington.  The intense part was only a few minutes, but it is still pretty ugly out.
spoke too soon 9 degree drop in temp in 10 minutes and raining cats and dogs
Just listening to the VHF, tornado warning for Hamilton, be careful out there!!!!!!!!!!! Just started to rain in south Mississauga. Crap the lights just blinked, better shut the computer down....
.....Just rolled into Hammy Town about 15 minutes ago. Nothing to drastic, some gusty winds and some large rain drops. Need more than this if I want the gardens to get wet.
Rolled thru St. Thomas about 3:45 - lots of rain, wind, thunder and lightning.  Pretty much passed us by now, just raining a little but sure is a lot cooler out.
hey Raf are you Mark P's cousin?

Southern Ontario is currently under a severe weather watch... intense lightning, winds... if your planning on getting out on the water this afternoon, please do check the local forecast for your area and keep an eye on the sky! http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/warnings/re..._e.html?onrm126 HH
Thanks HH for the notice.Dan

Yep...that's why I took the train today....  Commuting from Toronto to Oshawa area on a Friday is bad enough!!  Throw in rain, hot and humid and no air conditioning in the car and the train is an easy choice....LOL
CHOO CHOO all the way home eh Cliff. Have a few pops and a nap.works for me.LOL   Bring on the rian,we need it.

wasin scarlem this morning and it was hot hot!  you culd feel it in the air that somehting is brewing.  I have to be in Fort erie this evening with a customer hopefully the bad weater is done by the time i drive home.  Cheers!
Yep, thanks Joe.  I was just check Intellicast and you can see the progression of the storm building.  Everyone be safe out there.  Joey

Has anyone from SW Ontario seen this storm yet?  Nothing in Burlington yet.  I'm hoping it comes and goes before the workday ends as I am picking up a fridge in Tornado Alley (Barrie) on my way to the cottage tonight.
Hey Fishnfriend... click on this link http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/radar/index_e.html?id=WKR ... actually, it looks like a secondary front is emerging, probably from day time heating. HH
Loads of free water for my garden and my grass. Always look on the bright side of life...
Barrie is getting it now,it is BLACK AS BLACK can be right now.I dont like this one bit.I like the rain but not the other "T" word.
Top cloud layer is just making my yard as I type. Lots of booming...33C..gotta be 40+ humidex and I've been working outside all afternoon..not fun.

Man, I just got home an hour ago. Things were looking just peachy for an hour or two on Scugog for 'skis...I just about had the boat on the hitch.Then common sense took hold after listening to a forcast or two and looking at the radar images. Its moving pretty quick. Oh well, I'll get to the Beer store before most, though  ! Stay safe everyone. No use messing with Mother Nature, shes gonna be real cranky this afternoon.
Nothing down here in welland/Port Colborne, hopefully it is a good one
The worst is still coming Brian.  Still sunny here in Burlington, though there are clouds in every direction.
It,s booming now and we are under a severe weather warning,Hail ,high winds and chance of that 'T' word Wife has the Cancer walk tonight too. Not going to be nice at all.
Man that was intense,and now it,s sunny out again. Check this out,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
Cool, that was neat B.  Joey
Just south of you in Whitby-was about to head to Scugog but chickening out also. Hard to be sensible tho-changed my mind 5 times in 10 minutes.
Zamboni, I'mstill changing my mind every minute! Hopefully it comes and goes quick and we can get out for the dinner bell.
Movin FAST just hit here.
wow Im sitting on my deck enjoying pints and watching the sun.  Looks pretty nice here in Mississauga
not for long aniceguy. I am in the NW corner of Mississausage and the wind's howling and lots of dark clouds to the west.
Thanks for the pics and video Brian.  Very cool.
Here she comes.....  RADAR
Just starting to cloud up and getting dark up here on the noth shore of Pigeon...  Guess I better close some windows and call the cats in...
